sentence.Network_en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentence.Network_cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentence.Network_en: Tenacity is the bridge to success.
The athletes displayed great tenacity throughout the contest.
sentence.Network_cn: 运动员在比赛中表现出坚韧的斗志.

entry.def: If you have tenacity, you are very determined and do not give up easily.

example.ex: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
example.tran: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

auth_sentence.content: They defended it with the tenacity of animals.
auth_sentence.res_content: They defended it with the tenacity of animals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They defended it with the tenacity of animals.

auth_sentence.content: You've got to admire the tenacity of Will Quantic' Holland.
auth_sentence.res_content: You've got to admire the tenacity of Will Quantic' Holland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You've got to admire the tenacity of Will Quantic' Holland.

auth_sentence.content: So I doubted my tenacity, sometimes, but not my product.
auth_sentence.res_content: So I doubted my tenacity, sometimes, but not my product.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So I doubted my tenacity, sometimes, but not my product.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"有……倾向;能力或特性等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap拿,抓+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→拿住的能力→容量;才能
auda大胆+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.大胆,鲁莽
loqu说话+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.多话,饶舌
mend缺点+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.虚假
rap夺+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.掠夺,贪婪
ten握住+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→tenacious的名词
ver真+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.真实性,诚实

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站得住脚的,无懈可击的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+able能……的→能拿住的
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站不住脚的,防守不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+tenable[adj.站得住脚的,无懈可击的]→adj.站不住脚的,防守不住的
con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,保持,生活费用
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man手+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→用手拿住→维修,坚持
sus下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acity表名词→tenacious名词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 租赁期限;租佃,租用,租赁
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+ancy表名词→拿[钱]租房
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
ten接住+nis→n.网球
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ure表名词→拿住状态
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
fas+ten拿住,握住,支撑→v.[使]固定，系牢，绑紧，扣紧
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人

sentences.en: Tenacity is the bridge to success.
